DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Screening test may help doctor detect cancer cell early plan effective treatment cancer . It yet know ultrasound effective without measure CA 125 level detect ovarian cancer postmenopausal woman . PURPOSE : Randomized clinical trial study effectiveness ultrasound without measure CA 125 level detect ovarian cancer postmenopausal woman .
DOC.brief_title: CA 125 Ultrasound Detecting Ovarian Cancer Postmenopausal Women
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine impact preclinical detection ovarian cancer screen ovarian cancer mortality postmenopausal woman . - Determine physical morbidity ovarian cancer screen population . - Determine psychological consequence screen result ( true negative , true positive , false negative , false positive ) population . - Compare intervention result screen ovarian cancer use CA 125 monitoring ultrasound population . - Compare feasibility population screening , term compliance rate annual screen ovarian cancer strategy . - Compare performance screen strategy population . OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Participants randomize 1 3 screening arm . - Arm I : Participants undergo screen . - Arm II : Participants undergo screen annual CA 125 level . Depending result test , patient may undergo additional screening . - Arm III : Participants undergo screen annual transvaginal transabdominal ultrasound . Depending result test , patient may undergo additional screening . Participants arm complete health questionnaire 3.5 7 year study entry . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 200,000 participant ( 100,000 arm I 50,000 arm II III ) accrue study within 3 year .
